title: Simulation-Based Leadership Training to Strengthen Organizational Learning and Market Orientation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business theory and understanding of organizational management concepts
context.additional_context: Development of organizational learning and market analysis competencies linked to mathematics-based decision-making modeling.

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically analyze market trend data in a simulation environment to establish strategic decision-making models.
Learners can design three or more knowledge-sharing processes within organizations through VR-based team missions.
Learners can explain procedures for quantifying customer feedback using social network analysis tools in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
